pr_title: achivement dairy plugin: add satisfiesRequirement to Requirement

timeline.bodyText: This should simply null-check localPlayer instead of catching NPE
timeline.author: deathbeam

timeline.message:
Null check getLocalPlayer

Instead of try catch and return false on NPE, check if getLocalPlayer() is null and if it, return false and if it isn't return getLocalPlayer.getCombatLevel() >= level
